channel.title: Life outside Academia on Sanchari Sen
channel.description: Recent content in Life outside Academia on Sanchari Sen

item.title: Life outside Academia
item.description: “All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy” is something I strongly believe in. Outside academics I spend my time reading (strictly fiction! Because who doesn’t love a good escape!). I am also an ametuer photographer, experimenting with my camera in different settings (check it out here!)-quite convenient since I love to travel a lot. Recently I have started writing and some of my musings go up here.
